title: All The Light We Cannot See
summary: A blind French girl and a German boy whose paths collide in occupied France as both try to survive the devastation of World War II.

title: Where The Crawdads Sing
summary: A haunting mystery and coming-of-age story of a young girl abandoned in the marshes of North Carolina.

title: Rich People Problems
summary: The final book in the 'Crazy Rich Asians' trilogy, following the Shang-Young family's drama over a massive inheritance.

title: Crazy Rich Asians
summary: An American-born Chinese economics professor accompanies her boyfriend to Singapore for his best friend's wedding, only to discover he is from an incredibly wealthy family.

title: Tentang Kamu
summary: A story about fighting for life, embracing destiny, and finding true meaning through the journey of a woman named Sri. In today’s fast-paced world, artificial intelligence is transforming every aspect of our lives—from how we work and make money to how we live and connect with others. Mastering AI in 2025 is your ultimate guide to harnessing the latest AI tools and apps to gain a personal and professional edge. Whether you want to boost productivity, increase income, streamline your workflow, or simply explore cutting-edge AI technologies, this book provides everything you need to stay ahead of the curve.

title: Pergi
summary: The story of Bujang, who leaves his home to face the world, encountering challenges that test his character and principles.

title: Garis Waktu
summary: A collection of thoughts and reflections on time, love, and loss, presented in a poetic and engaging manner.

title: Becoming
summary: The memoir of former First Lady of the United States Michelle Obama, detailing her life from childhood to her years in the White House.

title: EMPIRE OF AI
summary: A NEW YORK TIMES BESTSELLER. An eye-opening account of the tech arms race shaping our planet.

title: SAPIENS
summary: A brief history of humankind exploring how Homo sapiens came to dominate the Earth.

title: ATOMIC HABITS
summary: An easy & proven way to build good habits & break bad ones, with practical strategies.

title: A BRIEF HISTORY OF TIME
summary: From the Big Bang to black holes—explore the nature of time and the universe itself.
